directions: In a 2-quart saucepan, sauté bell pepper and onion in oil over medium heat 5 minutes. Add turkey and cook, stirring, about 5 minutes. Add tomato sauce, beans, seasonings, and chipotle. Stir well. Increase heat, stirring, until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Ladle into bowls; top with cheese.
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, cored, seeded and chopped
1/2 tsp canned or 1/4 tsp dried chipotle pepper, minced
title: Turkey-Chipotle Chile
